title.narrative: Win-Win Gender Equality Means Good Business (in co-delegation with UN Women)

description.narrative: Win-Win: gender equality means good business is a Project funded by the European Union (EU) and will be co-implemented by the International Labour Organization (ILO) and UN Women. The overarching objective of the programme is to promote EU and international shared principles and values of gender equality and women`s economic empowerment. The overall objective will be achieved by recognizing women as beneficiaries and partners of growth and development, by increasing commitment of private sector (enterprises and employers’ organizations) to gender equality and women´s empowerment and by strengthening companies’ capacities to implement these commitments. The action will ultimately contribute to the achievement of gender equality through enabling women’s business leadership, labour force participation, entrepreneurship, economic empowerment and thus their full and equal participation in society.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission, Service for Foreign Policy Instruments, Partnership Instrument

department.narrative: Departement of Partnerships and Field Support (PARDEV)

sector.narrative: ILO Results Framework 2020-2021: Output 1.1. Increased institutional capacity of employer and business membership organizations (EBMOs)
